title: Message to the Governor General of Ceylon on the Death of Prime Minister Bandaranaike.
text:
His Excellency Sir Oliver Ernest Goonetilleke, G.C.M.G., K.C.V.O., K.B.E. Governor General of Ceylon

Dear Governor General:

I was deeply shocked to hear of the passing of Prime Minister Bandaranaike. The world has lost a true friend of peace. Please extend my deepest sympathies to Mrs. Bandaranaike and to the people of Ceylon. Sincerely,

DWIGHT D. EISENHOWER
